tool_description: Evaluates identified hazards and assigns risk ratings based on severity, likelihood, and exposure factors.

hazard_type.description: Category of hazard: physical, chemical, biological, ergonomic, or psychosocial

hazard_description.description: Detailed description of the identified hazard

severity_level.description: Potential severity of harm (1-5 scale where 5 is most severe)

likelihood_score.description: Probability of occurrence (1-5 scale where 5 is most likely)

exposure_frequency.description: Frequency of exposure: rare, occasional, frequent, or continuous

error_messages: Invalid hazard type: Must be one of [physical, chemical, biological, ergonomic, psychosocial]
Invalid severity level: Must be integer between 1 and 5
Invalid likelihood score: Must be integer between 1 and 5
Invalid exposure frequency: Must be one of [rare, occasional, frequent, continuous]
Invalid personnel count: Must be positive integer
Empty hazard description: Description cannot be empty
usage: Input hazard details and assessment parameters to calculate comprehensive risk ratings and priority levels for remediation planning.

risk_level.description: Risk classification: low, medium, high, or critical

priority_ranking.description: Priority for remediation (1 being highest priority)

recommended_actions.description: List of recommended risk mitigation actions
